author: Al Jazeera
title: Pompeo says US may never restore WHO funds
description: US Secretary of State calls for WHO overhaul while US Democrats slam Trump administration for 'scapegoating' the agency.
content: US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said that a fundamental reform of the World Health Organization (WHO) was needed following its handling of the coronavirus pandemic and that the United States, the WHO's biggest donor, may never restore funding to the United … [+3776 chars]
